ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Server/Guild Help
ygData.msgSnippet: We have this kinder, gentler guild on Povar server called Royal Order of Norrath (www.royalorderofnorrath.com) if you ever want to go to a new server. We are
ygData.messageBody:
We have this kinder, gentler guild on Povar server called Royal Order
of Norrath (www.royalorderofnorrath.com) if you ever want to go to a
new server. We are sort of a training guild in many ways. We have a
relationship with a raiding guild for those in their high 50s+ that
want to do the hard core raids.

Dagdas Darlin
56th degree Princess Cleric
Povar Server

On Tue, 02 Dec 2003 11:09:58 -0000
"jersey_jager" <jersey_jager@...> wrote:
>I am looking for a strong active guild. I thought I had found one.
>It had many players they were on all the time and helped out. But
>they have had many players leave the guild or leave the server, even
>the officers. I would like a supportive guild who do things
>together on more than a rare occasion and do not mind a semi
>newbie. Even a small guild but who do things and are on more than
>once a month.
>
>thanks,
>Christine
>
>
